nodes.text: Monchantics was a company that was led by the Siniteen entrepreneur and HoloNet interface designer Sibs Monchan. The company earned hundreds of millions of credits during the waning years of the Galactic Republic and at the time that Monchan undertook a cruiser aboard the luxury liner Salin Mariner, Monchantics was a month away from launching an initial public offering on the Mileva Stock Exchange.
